entry.title: Friday night: Chance of wet flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of wet flurries or rain showers. Fog patches developing this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:47 PM PST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of wet flurries or rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Snow level rising to 900 metres in the morning. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:47 PM PST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Snow level 900 metres. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:47 PM PST Friday 30 December 2022
